summary: As a Software Engineer at Uju, you'll contribute to cutting-edge projects in software development, collaborating with a dynamic team to create innovative solutions for our tech-driven initiatives.
qualification: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
description: Join our technology team to design, develop, test, and deploy software solutions. Work on projects ranging from software applications to system integrations, applying your expertise in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++.
addtionalrequrement: • Strong problem-solving skills

summary: Shape the user experience and visual identity of Uju's products as a UX/UI Designer. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create compelling designs that enhance user satisfaction and engagement.

addtionalrequrement: • Portfolio showcasing design projects
